instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
threads.message: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> the Screen Backlight  only comes on when lid is closed then open if lid is open and you hit power the mac boots up with no display until you close the lid and open then it comes on what is the problem thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
threads.message: Wrong lcd year model, for sure

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Screen Backlight  ONLY comes on when lid is closed then open
threads.message:
Be sure to have compatible LCD assembly.
Post <SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> level when the problem occurs.
